title: How a father won TWO huge lottery prizes in one night to become Australia's newest millionaire
text:
A father from western Sydney has become a millionaire overnight after winning two huge lottery prizes with one ticket.

The ecstatic man from Parramatta scored two division one prizes on Monday, taking home $1,333,333.34.

His double division win comes after he accidentally marked two games with the same winning numbers.

A dad from Western Sydney has scored two division one prizes with one ticket (stock image)

The man purchased his 18-game entry at Parramatta CBD Newsagency on Church Street.

The winning numbers were 9, 2, 19, 17, 36 and 22, with supplementary figures 26 and 8.

The dad told NSW lottery officials he was still 'in a state of shock' after hitting the jackpot.

'You have no idea how this has helped my family,' he said.

'I'll be able to pay off my mortgage and I'm able to help my kids. It's already been spent mate, but all wisely I can assure you.

'But it wasn't deliberate that I had two rows of the same numbers. It was just that I had to mark another line on the ticket, so it's a very happy accident!'

Newsagency owner William Ho said he had never sold a division one ticket in the 15 years he had worked at the store.

'It's such good news. We wish our customer all the best with their double prize,' Mr Ho said.
description: A dad from western Sydney has become a millionaire overnight after winning two huge lottery prizes with one ticket.
authors: Paula Ahillon For Daily Mail Australia
